about.text1: Hello! My name is Luis, I'm a Front-End Developer located in Brazil.

text2.first: I have a passion for building

about.text3: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

card1.title: Linktree
card1.text: The web app for visualizing my personalized linktree. View my social medias and topic links

card2.title: Move.pomodor
card2.text: An application that combines the pomodoro technique with physical exercises for those who spend a lot of time in front of the computer.
